results.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
results.reason: This verse reassures us of God's constant presence, especially in moments of loneliness.
results.reflection: Even in isolation, God's presence offers strength and courage.

results.text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
results.reason: This verse speaks of God's presence in the darkest times, providing comfort and guidance.
results.reflection: In life's valleys, God walks beside us, offering comfort and protection.

results.text: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes God's support and presence, offering strength during lonely times.
results.reflection: God's strength sustains us, lifting us up when we feel alone.

results.text: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
results.reason: Jesus promises His perpetual presence, assuring us that we are never truly alone.
results.reflection: Christ's promise of eternal presence brings hope amid loneliness.

results.text: Where shall I go from your Spirit? Or where shall I flee from your presence? If I ascend to heaven, you are there! If I make my bed in Sheol, you are there! If I take the wings of the morning and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea, even there your hand shall lead me, and your right hand shall hold me.
results.reason: This passage highlights God's omnipresence, affirming that we are never beyond His reach.
results.reflection: No matter where we are, God's hand guides and holds us close.
